title: C2H6 formation - what increases rxn rate

content.prompt: Which of the following will most likely increase the rate of the reaction represented above?

choices.label: Decreasing the temperature of the reaction system
Adding a heterogeneous catalyst to the reaction system
Increasing the volume of the reaction vessel using a piston
Removing some H2(g) from the reaction system

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
